Headline: Kimball-bound Brown Line Delays
ShortDescription: Kimball-bound Brown Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier signal problems at Belmont. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Kimball-bound Brown Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier signal problems at Belmont.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
